TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Attachment extends System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase

span.span: Represents an attachment to an email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与类一起使用 。The class is used with the class. 所有消息都包括 ，其中包含消息的内容。All messages include a , which contains the content of the message. 除了正文外，你可能还需要发送其他文件。In addition to the body, you might want to send additional files. 这些将作为附件发送，并表示为 实例。These are sent as attachments and are represented as instances. 若要将附件添加到邮件中，请将其添加到 集合中。To add an attachment to a mail message, add it to the collection. 附件内容可以是 、 或文件名。Attachment content can be a , , or file name. 您可以使用任何构造函数指定附件中的内容 。You can specify the content in an attachment by using any of the constructors. 附件的 MIME Content-type 标头信息由 属性表示。The MIME Content-Type header information for the attachment is represented by the property. Content-type 标头指定媒体类型和子类型以及任何关联的参数。The Content-Type header specifies the media type and subtype and any associated parameters. 用于 获取与附件关联的实例。Use to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME 内容处置标头由 属性表示。The MIME Content-Disposition header is represented by the property. 内容处置标头指定附件的演示文稿和文件时间戳。The Content-Disposition header specifies the presentation and file time stamps for an attachment. 仅当附件为文件时，才会发送内容处置标头。A Content-Disposition header is sent only if the attachment is a file. 使用 属性可获取与附件关联的实例。Use the property to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME 内容传输编码标头由 属性表示。The MIME Content-Transfer-Encoding header is represented by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将文件附加到电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates attaching a file to an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 。The property is set to . 如果流的 属性为 `false` ，则附件和 包含它的不能重复使用。If the stream's property is `false`, the attachment and the that contains it are not reusable. 您必须提供一个流，才能对其进行搜索以重用附件。You must supply a stream that can be searched to reuse an attachment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to call this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的信息 表示 MIME 内容处理标头。The information in the class represents the MIME Content-Disposition header. 此标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍，在中提供 [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/) 。This header is described in RFC 2183, available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取附件的， 并显示其属性。The following code example gets the for an attachment and displays its properties. An object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容采用 ASCII 格式，则字符编码设置为 ASCII。If the content is in ASCII format then the character encoding is set to ASCII. 对于所有其他格式，字符编码设置为 utf-8。For all other formats, the character encoding is set to utf-8. 默认媒体类型为纯文本。The default media type is plain text. 如果内容不是 ASCII 格式并且编码为 null，则使用 utf-8 编码。If the content is not in ASCII format and the encoding is null, utf-8 encoding is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于为此附件生成的 content-type 标头。The property is used in the Content-Type header generated for this attachment. 收到带附件的电子邮件时，将显示为附件的名称。The is displayed as the attachment's name when the email with the attachment is received. RFC 2045 第5.1 节中介绍了详细说明 Content-type 标头语法的语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供了有关 MIME 媒体类型及其参数的详细信息。RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters. 中提供了这些 Rfc [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/) 。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示有关附件的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to display information about an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#19)]
